title: 15592mb patch/update?
body:
Just downloaded league onto a new laptop, after the first round of patching before you can login it downloaded files around 1550mb (1.5gb?) but now that I've logged in and the files have been scanned I'm apparently downloading files in the region of 15592mb 15.5gb? I'm pretty sure the game files aren't that big? Or has something massively changed that I'm not aware of? 

Cheers guys.

replies.body: Same for me, have a slow internet(afraid to turn off client to start over). Friend said that full patched game weights for him 11.6 gb. So this makes no sense {{champion:141}}
Now started again for a third time, still no help here on in response to a ticket, good job riot thanks.
And it's just started from the beginning again after doing 8gb!
